name: Southern Tour
description: Discover Lima has prepared one of the best tours you can take to your arrival in Lima. Only 3 hours from Lima , three beautiful places full of history , emotion , taste and full adrenaline will make your day unforgettable. Visit together the southern Peruvian coast : " Paracas, Ballestas Islands ", " The Vineyards of Pisco in Ica " and " The Dunes of Huacachina ."
